ttl.name: REAR NO. 1 SEAT ASSEMBLY (for RH Side)

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR SEAT CUSHION HINGE COVER LH

s2.ptxt: Using a clip remover, remove the clip.
Using a screwdriver, detach the 2 claws and remove the hinge cover.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR SEAT CUSHION HINGE COVER RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedures described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 1 SEAT ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Unlock the seat locks by horizontally pulling the reclining release handle. Then fold the seat as shown in the illustration.

atten3.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the vehicle body.
